Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which we believe is truly exceptional. It's designed to meet your needs and enhance your experience in ways you might not have imagined. Given its unique features and the quality craftsmanship involved, we're confident it will be a valuable addition to your collection. We're extending this exclusive opportunity to you at an introductory price of $150. This is a limited-time offer, so I hope you'll consider taking advantage of it. If you have any questions or need more information, please let me know. Looking forward to your consideration. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
